CustomField.formula: IF ( Number_of_Partial_Closes__c > 0, Partials_Profit_Pips__c, IF( ISPICKVAL(Side__c, 'BUY'), (X1st_Trade_Close_Price__c - X1st_Trade_Open_Price__c) * Currency__r.Pip_Size__c, (X1st_Trade_Open_Price__c - X1st_Trade_Close_Price__c) * Currency__r.Pip_Size__c ) )
CustomField.label: Final Pips Profit
